ygData.subject: Re: Lvl 12 pet spell question
ygData.msgSnippet: i remember that around that lvl is where you start to see the differentiation in pc vs. mob levels.  at about 16 you will (i think) usually summon a green pet.
ygData.messageBody:
i remember that around that lvl is where you start to see the
differentiation in pc vs. mob levels. at about 16 you will (i think)
usually summon a green pet. now, at lvl 24/25, my pets are always blue (if
i check, which i generally dont anymore). the only time i really worried
about it was when i had to summon a pet that could hit magic creatures.
otherwise i would just let the pet die fighting and recast. get more xp w/o
the pet anyway, so it works out in the long run.

belphenor


>
>I am almost lvl 13 now, and I've cast a LOT of pets with the lvl 12 pet
>spell...
>
>Every single one has been blue. My guess is that it really casts a lvl 9
>to 11 or 10
>to 11 pet.
>
>-Poppa
>
>
>
>TkAdam@... wrote:
>
> > From: TkAdam@...
> >
> > In a message dated 2/11/00 10:50:28 AM Eastern Standard Time,
> > nrusso@... writes:
> >
> > > What is the deal with the lvl 12 pet spell? I have a necro guide
>(from
> > > Allakhazam's) that says the lvl 12 pet spell is supposed to summon a
>pet
> > > from lvl 11 - 13. I've lost count of how many times I cast that
>spell at
> > > lvl 12 and I was NEVER able to get anything other than a blue-conning
>pet!
> > >
> > > Have you all had the same experience, or have I not sacrificed the
>right
> > > kind of chicken to the Verant gods?
> > >
> > > Mujahid 13 Necromancer Solusek Ro
> >
> > Allakazam's is wrong...
> >
> > at 12 you get an 8-12 pet, not 11-13 :(
> > At some point the scale gets even worse...
> >
> > The rational is the the pet is an NPC and the levels do not scale the
>same
> > way...
